° PICK UP YOUR RENTAL CAR OUTSIDE THE OPENING HOURS : The 24/7 Service App guides you to sign the documents and pick up your keys at the Keybox of your Service Partner.

° EXCHANGE PICTURES AND DOCUMENTS : Save time by sending them via the app. You can receive also pictures and documents from your Service Partner.
° WINTER/SUMMER WHEEL EXCHANGE : Book your time slot for a quick exchange and save time.
° IN CASE OF EMERGENCY : All necessary information about BMW and MINI RoadAssist 24/7 is only one click away.
° MAINTENANCE CONTRACT: You find all relevant information about the content of your Maintenance Contract under your profile.
° ALWAYS UP TO DATE : via the 24/7 Service App you are updated about your Service Partner, your appointment and your mobility, always and everywhere. The 24/7 app guides you through the whole journey and you have all necessary information available at the right time. 
------------

Attention: 
° To use the 24/7 Service App a BMW or MINI Connected account is needed. You also need to connect your vehicle to your Connected account. This is necessary to link all information about your car in the app. If you don’t have an account yet, the app will guide you through this process. 
° With the 24/7 Service App you can book appointments and communicate with an official BMW or MINI Service Partner of your choice in Belgium and Luxemburg. Once you selected a specific dealer, you are in direct contact with him. 
° The 24/7 Service app is connected also with the BMW and MINI Connected app. When you ask for an appointment in the Connected app you will be transferred to the 24/7 Service app. 
° It can happen that some BMW or MINI Service Partners do not offer all mentioned 24/7 services. Information is available in the app itself.

Discover Cabify, a transport app that lets you get around the city with private cars with a driver, with the highest quality of service and high safety standards. In a few minutes you’ll have a car with a driver or a taxi waiting to take you wherever you want.
 
How does Cabify work?
 
1. Order or reserve your journey. Open the app and tell us where you are and where you want to go. Choose the type of vehicle your want to travel in; Lite, Executive, Easy taxi… discover all the options available in your city!
2. Confirm your journey and… a driver’s on their way! We’ll tell you the name of your driver and  your vehicle details including the registration plate, and how far away it is.
3. Know the estimated price before you travel. We’ll tell you from the start how much you’ll pay for the ride, even when you ride in taxi thanks to our virtual taximeter. What’s more, you can select the payment method that most suits you (credit or debit card, cash, PayPal… ).
4. Share the experience. You can send your journey details to family or friends so they know where you are in each moment and so you feel safer.
 
What’s more, you can personalize your ride. In the Cabify app, select what music your prefer, whether you want the driver to open the door for you and if you want the air-conditioning on. All so you can move around the city in the most comfortable way possible.
 
Where is Cabify available?
 
Cabify is available in more than 90 cities. You can get around in our cars or taxis in the following countries: Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Dominican Republic, Ecuador,Mexico, Panama, Peru, Spain and Uruguay. See the complete list of cities where we operate at cabify.com
 
What advantages does the Cabify app give you?
 
- Your safety is our priority. All journeys are geolocalized and can be shared immediately with a family member or friend. And you’ll know the details of your vehicle, the driver and your pick up point.
- We’ve added Easy Taxi. Now in one app you’ll find more options. You decide what kind of car or taxi you want to ride in.
- Carbon neutral journeys. We offset all the CO2 that your journeys generate. Get around more environmentally responsibly!
- The best drivers in  the market. In Cabify the criteria to accept drivers on our platform is the most selective around and all drivers go through and on-boarding process.
- Know the price before you travel. We always show you the price before you order a ride. This way you can travel relaxed, knowing how much you’re going to pay.
- 100% personalization. You decide how you want to get around. Choose the payment method that best suits you and even the type of music you’d like to hear.
- With just one account, more than 90 cities. If you like to travel with Cabify you can do so in more than ten countries without the need to create new accounts.
 
Do you want to be a driver with Cabify?
 
If what really moves you is helping others discover the city, join one of the fleets of drivers that use Cabify. Start to earn money driving your car or taxi with an app that cares about your safety and offers you the best fares. Learn more and register in cabify.com/drivers or download the Cabify Drivers app.
 
Looking for corporate transport options for your business?
 
Offer your employees the best transport app. Our corporate service will allow you to have a large fleet of cars and taxis at your disposal, designed to meet all your company’s needs. In addition, our management platform will allow you to have greater control of expenses and journeys made. Find out more at cabify.com/business.

Sightseeing.lu provides you with an interactive map, navigation and self-guided audio tours.
You have access to audio, images and a lot more useful information that will make discovering Luxembourg easier.
The app includes:
Offline GPS-localization and  navigation to any Point of Interest (POI), avoiding expensive mobile data fees
Adapts to your situation – use the app while walking, biking, or while using any kind of public transport
Contents represent a combination of historical facts and storytelling by native speakers, written in a light and pleasant tone
POIs include 2-minute long audios supported by text and image
In order to use this app you need to purchase your content at www.sightseeing.lu.
Battery Disclaimer:
GPS running in the background can drain your battery faster. Be prepared with a fully charged battery and maybe bring along a power bank or similar.
We also recommend you to disable the location function on your phone.

The Royal Caribbean app guides you through your upcoming vacation. From check-in through departure, use the app to plan your entire voyage. Features may vary from ship to ship. The app is free to download and use. In-app purchases available. Once onboard, connect to your ship's guest Wi-Fi. No internet package required.

Before your cruise you can:

- Sign into your account to view your booked cruises (must be at least 13 years old to have a guest account)
- Complete check-in – scan travel documents and select your arrival time
- Link reservations with other guests so you can make plans together
- Make dining, shore excursion and, where available, entertainment reservations
- Learn about the ship’s activity, entertainment, and dining venues, including menus, view deck maps and explore spa treatments and shore excursions available on your cruise

Once onboard, connect to ship Wi-Fi so you can:

- Complete the guest safety briefing on your time before setting sail. The app will even help you out with a reminder notification.
- Make specialty and My Time dining reservations
- Quickly and conveniently reserve shore excursions and shows
- Plan each day by browsing daily activities and saving them to your calendar. Notifications will remind you when you have plans.
- Chat with family, friends, and fellow travelers (fee applies)
- Find your way around with complete deck plans
- Track your onboard expense account in the app (or not… after all you’ll be on vacation!)
- Save today while planning for your next vacation onboard with a NextCruise deposit available only during your cruise
- On select ships, the app will function as your room key and some rooms offer complete stateroom controls, from temperature to TV

We continue to develop and enhance the app and are looking for your ideas and feedback. Email AppFeedback@rccl.com and tell us what you’d like to see in the future.

The GO Ostbelgien app offers:
 
1380 km of walking pleasure on the signposted junction node network;
850 km of cycle routes on the signposted Velotour cycle route network.
 
The route networks, designed according to the junction node system, make it easy to plan a route or circular walk from node to node. In addition, it is possible to save the selected cycling or hiking routes and then use them at any time. Thanks to the built-in GPS function, your position can be determined anywhere. All routes are signposted in the terrain.
 
Having saved a route online, it can be used offline afterwards.
The GO Ostbelgien app is a link to the internet hiking route planner https://www.ostbelgien.eu/en/walking/hiking-route-planer . Here you can easily and conveniently plan routes, save them and import them to your smartphone using a QR code.
 
Discover East Belgium on foot or by bike!
